EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-07-19-IT Compliance Survey Send Commercial.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: $25 Amazon Gift Card for a 5 Minute Survey | IT Compliance Survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly: <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NNZ27K2?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_zo8jzhpyio=[marketo_zo8jzhpyio_value]&marketo_njw04rm35s=[marketo_njw04rm35s_value]&marketo_4gg309aesw=[marketo_4gg309aesw_value]&marketo_01t2k50kgw=[marketo_01t2k50kgw_value]]]> {{lead.First Name:default=Hi there}}, At Turbonomic our mission is to be far more than just a vendor. This is why we want to take a step back, let you know that we understand your time is extremely valuable and extend an offer to partner with you to help make the world a better place. We are excited to roll out our brand new IT Compliance Survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NNZ27K2?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_zo8jzhpyio=[marketo_zo8jzhpyio_value]&marketo_njw04rm35s=[marketo_njw04rm35s_value]&marketo_4gg309aesw=[marketo_4gg309aesw_value]&marketo_01t2k50kgw=[marketo_01t2k50kgw_value]]]>. We are offering a $25 Amazon gift card for completing the 5 minute survey by end of day today (July 19th). Furthermore, we are offering $100 Amazon gift card for agreeing to a 30 minute meeting with a Turbonomic engineer (meeting must complete by AugustÂ 2nd). If at the end of the meeting, you choose to engage in a proof of value, we will donate $1,000 to the 501(c)(3) charity of your choosing. We look forward to the opportunity to speak with you around how Turbonomic is changing the IT industry for the better, but we are much more excited to partner with you to make an impact for a cause that is close to you. <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/NNZ27K2?marketo_cr6r585pkg=[marketo_cr6r585pkg_value]&marketo_zo8jzhpyio=[marketo_zo8jzhpyio_value]&marketo_njw04rm35s=[marketo_njw04rm35s_value]&marketo_4gg309aesw=[marketo_4gg309aesw_value]&marketo_01t2k50kgw=[marketo_01t2k50kgw_value]]]> - The Turbonomic Team
